name: Bubble shooter
description:
"Bubble Shooter" is a casual game where the player controls a cute bunny to shoot bubbles.
When the fired bubbles are the same color as the surrounding bubbles and the number exceeds 3, the bubbles will be eliminated.
The more bubbles you remove, the higher the score, and you can clear the level when you reach a certain score.
【Game Operation】
The player controls the direction of the bubble launch through the position of the mouse, and clicks the left mouse button to launch the bubble.
【Game Features】
There are many levels in the play, and the difficulty will become higher and higher. It takes a certain skill to get through. More challenges are waiting for you.
